scripts: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"FAQPage","name":"Frequently Asked Questions","mainEntity":[{"@type":"Question","name":"Why is subscribing to a DrinkPrime water purifier for home better than buying?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Subscribing to home water purification eliminates upfront costs, AMC, and service charges. Enjoy hassle-free access to pure drinking water."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I modify or upgrade my water purifier subscription plan later?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, enjoy flexibility in modifying or upgrading your water purifier subscription plan using the DrinkPrime mobile app based on your changing needs."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How does DrinkPrime ensure prompt RO water purifier service?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Enjoy hassle-free after-sales RO water purifier service with DrinkPrime at no additional cost. Our IoT technology constantly monitors water quality, triggering proactive RO water purifier service alerts. The DrinkPrime mobile app aids in diagnosing water dispensing issues, while our call center and company-operated technician network ensure speedy resolutions."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How does DrinkPrime's RO UV water purifier subscription work?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Subscribe easily on our website, and enjoy the installation of water purifier within 48 hours. Choose a plan based on your water consumption, and benefit from lifetime free maintenance and filter changes (based on flow rate)."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How does the quality of DrinkPrime water compare to that of water cans?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"DrinkPrime's RO water purifier for home offers superior quality compared to cans.
